name: Charon's Legacy
description:
Charon’s Legacy is an action adventure card game.

You have been chosen by the goddess of the night Nyx, to travel the Underworld in search of her son Charon.

The game was made in a few days for Godot Wild Jam #45

If you like the idea, we are ready to make a full-fledged prologue!

We will be glad to receive your feedback.
